title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 5 - Attaching and Plugging Drip Tape to a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Attaching drip tape to a header pipe and plugging the end
subtasks: Using Phillips head screwdriver to punch hole in lay flat header
Ensuring hole is adequately punched while water is on
Inserting fitting into hole and confirming secure connection
Cutting off 1-2 inch piece from drip tape end
Folding tape and slipping it into the cut piece
Ensuring the plugged end is secure
Activating water flow to check for proper installation
Consolidating soil around drip tape every foot to secure it
